title: The phone cannot be searched by Bluetooth on other phones.
answer:
1Bluetooth is not enabled. 

 Solution: On the home screen, click Settings >Bluetooth. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109980) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109981)

2Bluetooth is on the invisible state after being enabled. 

 Solution: On the home screen, click Settings>Bluetooth, and click the first entry. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109982)
